scripts.ci:prepare: pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --ignore-scripts && git add .changeset CHANGELOG.md packages pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.ci:publish: pnpm publish -r --provenance --access public --publish-branch main && pnpm changeset tag
scripts.clean: node -e "(function rm(directory) { ['.next', '.turbo', 'node_modules', 'dist'].includes(path.basename(directory)) ? fs.rmSync(directory, { recursive: true, force: true }) : fs.existsSync(directory) && fs.statSync(directory).isDirectory() && fs.readdirSync(directory).forEach(filePath => rm(path.join(directory, filePath))); })('.');"
